Package index

Prepare field survey

Set up field survey design for camera trap deployement

mm_survey_design()
Create a survey design for camera trap deployment
pendjari
Pendjari national park and surrounding areas

Process media (images) file

Functions reading and writing metadata

mm_app()
Run App
mm_get_metadata()
Extract image metadata
mm_get_hs()
Retrieve hierarchical subject values from image metadata
mm_create_hs()
Create or add hierarchical subject values in image metadata
mm_remove_hs()
Remove specific or all hierarchical subject values from image metadata

Data processing

Functions for preparing and tansforming camera trap data

mm_read()
Read a delimited file into a tibble
mm_stack_df()
Stack a list of data frame
mm_check_location()
Interactive camera trap location adjustment
mm_independence()
Evaluate event independence
mm_to_radian()
Convert time to radians
mm_solartime()
Transform time to solar time anchored to sunrise and sunset
mm_to_time()
Convert radian to time
mm_to_community()
Convert data to a community matrix
mm_standardize()
Standardize community data matrix
mm_check_name()
Check species name and retrieve Taxonomic Serial Number (TSN) from ITIS
mm_to_occupancy()
Convert camera trap data to occupancy format
mm_find_break()
Detect time gaps in a datetime series

Data analysis

Functions to run common camera trap data analysis

mm_describe_df()
Descriptive statistic on dataset
mm_plot_density()
Plot species' activity patterns
mm_plot_overlap()
Plot overlap between two species' activity patterns
mm_plot_overlap_coef()
Plot overlap coefficient matrix
mm_plot_rose_diagram()
Plot a 24-hour rose diagram of daily activity
mm_plot_camtrap_activity()
Plot camera trap activity over time
mm_overlap_estimates()
Estimates of coefficient of overlapping
mm_bootstrap() mm_resample() mm_boot_estimates()
Generate bootstrap estimates of overlap
mm_boot_ci()
Bootstrap confidence intervals
mm_ci()
Calculate confidence interval
mm_lognorm_ci()
Log-normal confidence interval
mm_overlap_matrix()
Estimate overlap coefficients for multiple species
mm_temporal_shift()
Calculate the temporal shift of one species' activity over two periods
mm_alpha_diversity()
Alpha diversity index
mm_dissimilarity()
Calculate dissimilarity between communities
mm_spatial_coverage()
Calculate observed spatial coverage of species
mm_summarise_camtrap_activity()
Create activity summary statistics
